TopicTitle: We know WHEN you started playing... but how many hours have you logged since then?

Articles.Content:
This is for all of you that get your Kerbal hours logged by steam!

I've been playing ~1 month and I've logged 154 hours... whoops.

My grades haven't suffered yet though!

Edited November 25, 2013 by horndgmium
250 or so hours.
Over 1k,KSP is my sleep now:D
Ha, me too... I think studying for the ASTB had something to do with this.
1149 hours - it's more like a second job at this point

I've been playing for over a year but just broke 350 hours. It should be noted though that its the game I have played most during that time, with the exception of table top DnD and Pathfinder, and legos with my son. So much time building with legos. I even tried to rebuild my old space shuttle model from 15+ years ago, but my son is a wrecking ball and smashes anything more than three hours old.

0 Hours

I don't have it on Steam

I marked 600-1000, but I have no idea. I've been playing since 0.9 or so, and I haven't switched to Steam, so close to 1000 is more of a minimum. I've quite possibly played more than 2000 hours, though.
Too damned many, or not nearly enough. I haven't decided which yet.
I do not have KSP on steam, but comparing to the other games I would guess around 200 hours or so...
2400 hours, I play LOTS! I get home at 3:30 PM and play until like 4 AM
I would GUESS around 350, having bought the game in 0.17 and never transferred to steam.
Uh, yeah, I've been playing it for 4,738 hours. #beatdat
Steam says I've played 168 hours, but I've probably played well over 1500 hours.
Just tipped 11 hours after I voted lol
1036 so far !

0... I hate Steam! Ok, well, I guess Origin is far worst. But I still don't have KSP on steam. And I will NOT click that "transfer to steam" button.

Edited November 25, 2013 by RocketPilot573

Let's see.. It's been around 770 days since I first played the game, and I've probably averaged about 1.5 hours a day playing it since then, so... somewhere in the neighborhood of 1100 to 1200 hours would be a fair guess.

...Non-steam transferer and proud. But i would estimate about in the 350-600 range, I slowed down playing around 0.20 and played minecraft more, but then I really picked it back up and i've sometimes played for 11-12 hours straight before.

0 Hours

I don't have it on Steam

This. Even if I had it on Steam I have it in Offline Mode so often, my "time played" on games is always way low.

This. Even if I had it on Steam I have it in Offline Mode so often, my "time played" on games is always way low.

Me too, no steam version here and I usually play in offline mode with my other games.

But I guess I could calculate how many hours... more than 4000 would be my guess.
about 800 hours. i got it in .17, transferred to sram late .20, could not play for .21, so that is an astounding concentration!

316 hrs on Steam version.

I'd like to see screenshots from people, who claimed 4k+ hrs.

This. Even if I had it on Steam I have it in Offline Mode so often, my "time played" on games is always way low.

And even if you are online that steam counter seems very inaccurate. I have seen it suddenly jump up or down tens of hours for no reason with other games.

316 hrs on Steam version.

I'd like to see screenshots from people, who claimed 4k+ hrs.

Alot of people have been playing it long before it came to steam, so that is entirely possible. I dont have steam and I bet i have spent 1000+ hours playing it.
